text: Dae is a 1979 Yugoslavian short documentary film directed by Stole Popov. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. It depicts a group of Roma celebrating St. George's Day (May 6). ==References== ==External links== * *Дае at the European Film Gateway Category:1979 films Category:1979 documentary films Category:1979 short films Category:Yugoslav films Category:Short documentary films
title: Dae (film)
